ui.heroSubtitle: You're not alone — that's why you can keep going. We bring you diet tips, healthy meal ideas, and ways to stay motivated.
ui.ctaTitle: Start your diet journey with friends today
ui.ctaDescription: We Diet is a social diet app for tracking meals, exercise, and weight. Stay motivated by encouraging each other and making dieting fun.
ui.footerTagline: You're not alone — that's why you can keep going. Have fun dieting together with friends.
